text:
<color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1241)@</color>

以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(426)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，並召喚 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 座<color=#4cc769>塔樓</color>加入我軍，且這座塔樓每 <color=#ccffcc>10</color> 秒會召喚 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 隻<color=#4cc769>木鐵人</color>。

<color=#4cc769>塔樓</color>和<color=#4cc769>木鐵人</color>屬性
<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1336)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1336)@</color>
<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1241)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1241)@</color>
機率性發動特殊攻擊
以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1351)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color> 將範圍內敵方捲起來造成物理傷害
